valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 12 Nov 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Thu 13 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low 200 miles west of FitzRoy 980 slow-moving, filling 984 by midday tomorrow. Low North Utsire 988 losing its identity

Cyclonic becoming north 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9 at first.

Rain at first, then showers.

Moderate or good.
